title: Ethnographic Case Study for Improving Online Science Course Design Quality

context.additional_context: A course improving online course quality through daily design activities in smartphone-based learning environments. Emphasis is placed on iterative content improvement and establishing normative quality standards through peer collaboration.

learning_goals: Learners can explain a systematic process for iteratively improving science content optimized for mobile environments.
Learners can apply a 3-tier evaluation criterion to assess online course design quality using peer feedback.
Learners can achieve over 80% improvement in content accessibility through routine design activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
